casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HAGAN 2019-0640 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Cause accepted. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2017-1703, State v. Dangler, and briefing schedule stayed. Sua sponte, cause consolidated with 2019-0679, State v. Hagan.
